com.compendium.core.datamodel
Class NodePosition

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCObject
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodePosition
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodePosition, IPCObject, ICoreConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class NodePosition
extends PCObject
implements INodePosition, java.io.Serializable

The INodePosition object defines the position of a node in a view. The position is defined by an X and Y coordinate in the view's relative coordinate system. And Node in View formatting properties are now in here too.

See Also:
